original_text: because they could not bear what was commanded: “If even an animal touches the mountain, it must be stoned to death.”
korean_text: 이는 짐승이라도 그 산에 들어가면 돌로 침을 당하리라 하신 명령을 그들이 견디지 못함이라

sentences.original_text: If even an animal touches the mountain,
it must be stoned to death.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 돌로 쳐 죽임을 당해야 한다.
